skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily meditation
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Daily Meditation is the Alexa skill that offers guided sessions to help you center yourself and bring calm into your day. With over 10 unique sessions, each lasting 10 minutes, and a variety of soothing voices combined with peaceful background sounds, this skill is designed to nurture both your mind and body for a balanced, mindful experience.

Unlock Pro Features to enjoy:

• Guided sessions with professional, calming voices
• A selection of background sounds ideal for relaxation and focus
• Unlimited access with no restrictions
• Regularly updated programs to deepen your meditation practice
• Full access to all session lengths

We value your feedback to help us improve and provide the best meditation and relaxation experience.

Enjoy your journey to daily mindfulness!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
